page.title: 18ATTITUDES TOWARDS DUNS
page.content: THE DINGERS'(DUNS PEOPLE) ATTITUDES TO DUNS ARE QUITE VARIED.ABOUT{50%}OF PEOPLE FROM DUNS WOULD RATHER LIVE IN DUNS THAN A LARGE CITY BECAUSE IN DUNS THERE'S PLENTY THINGS TO DO, AND IT CAN BE NICE AND QUIET AT TIMES.{67% THOUGHT THERE WASN'T A LARGE ENOUGH VARIETY OF SHOPS AND THERE SHOULD BE MORE. ROUGHLY{55%}WOULD LIKE TO HAVE A HOLIDAY IN DUNS IF THEY DID NOT LIVE THERE,MOST OF THESE PEOPLE ARE WOMEN.{ {70%}PREFER THEIR OWN GARDEN TO THE PARK, PRACTICALLY ALL OF THESE ARE ADULTS.ABOUT{34%}OF THE DUNS PEOPLE THOUGHT THERE IS NOT A LARGE ENOUGH VARIETY OF JOBS IN DUNS,THE OTHER{66%} THOUGHT THERE ARE PLENTY FOR THE SIZE OF THE TOWN.ALTOGETHER{80%}OF THE DUNS PEOPLE ENJOY LIVING IN DUNS. { }
